SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, ALL_LIST.* FROM ( SELECT A.RWARD_ID AS rwardId , A.RWARDWNR_ID AS rwardManId , A.RWARD_CODE AS rwardCd , A.RWARD_DE AS rwardDe , A.RWARD_NM AS rwardNm , A.PBLEN_CN AS pblenCn , A.SANCTNER_ID AS sanctnerId , A.CONFM_AT AS confmAt , A.SANCTN_DT AS sanctnDt , A.RETURN_RESN AS returnResn , A.ATCH_FILE_ID AS atchFileId , A.INFRML_SANCTN_ID AS infrmlSanctnId , C.USER_NM AS rwardManNm , (select mst.USER_NM from COMVNUSERMASTER mst where mst.ESNTL_ID = SANCTNER_ID) AS sanctnerNm , (select code_nm from COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE where code_id ='COM055' and code = A.RWARD_CODE) AS rwardCdNm , (select info.ORGNZT_NM from COMTNORGNZTINFO info where info.ORGNZT_ID = C.ORGNZT_ID ) AS orgnztNm FROM COMTNRWARDMANAGE A, COMVNUSERMASTER C WHERE 1=1 AND A.RWARDWNR_ID = C.ESNTL_ID
A.RWARD_CODE = #searchKeyword#
A.RWARD_DE BETWEEN #searchFromDate# AND #searchToDate#
C.USER_NM like '%'||#searchNm#||'%'
ORDER BY FRST_REGIST_PNTTM DESC ) ALL_LIST ) WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex# AND RNUM <= #firstIndex# + #recordCountPerPage#
